REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0444 reute b f BC-SWISS-CANTONAL-BANK-G 03-11 0063

TEXT.TITLE: SWISS CANTONAL BANK GROUP SETS 150 MLN SFR BOND
TEXT.BODY: The Central Issuing Office of the Swiss cantonal banks said it is launching a 150 mln Swiss franc 4-1/2 pct 12-year bond issue at 99.75 pct. Subscriptions close March 23. The funds will be partly used for the conversion or repayment of an 80 mln franc 4-3/4 pct 1972/87 bond maturing on April 15. REUTER
